keyMoments.title: Mocha's Arrival at Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals how Mocha and Sind arrived at Punk Hazard, where Caesar Clown manipulated them with a fabricated story about illness.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of Caesar's manipulation and how he separated children from their families.

keyMoments.title: Mocha's Brave Escape
keyMoments.description: After learning the candy will kill the children, Mocha flees with all of it to protect her friends, despite being pursued by drug-affected children.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Mocha's selflessness and courage in the face of danger.

reveals.information: Was taken from her mother at age 6 by Caesar Clown under false pretenses of illness

relationships.description: Mocha was manipulated and experimented on by Caesar, who fabricated stories to gain her trust.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals how Caesar deceived Mocha with a false story about his dead son.

keyMoments.title: Defensive Battle Against Monet
keyMoments.description: Zoro engages Monet in combat but fights defensively to protect Nami, Robin, and Chopper rather than attacking offensively.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's strategic thinking and his priority to protect his crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Zoro and the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Monet fights Zoro while attempting to eliminate Nami, Robin, and Chopper, displaying multiple snow-based techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Monet's full combat capabilities with the Yuki Yuki no Mi.
keyMoments.quote: Why do you only block? Fight back!

keyMoments.title: Uses Yuki Gaki
keyMoments.description: Creates a solid snow wall to block doorways and prevent pursuit.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this defensive technique in the anime.

keyMoments.title: Uses Mannen Yuki
keyMoments.description: Transforms into snow and surrounds opponents to immobilize and weaken them with severe cold.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates her signature technique and the full power of her Logia fruit.

keyMoments.title: Uses Tabira Yuki: Hada Gatana
keyMoments.description: Freezes her wing feathers into ice blades capable of clashing with Zoro's swords.
keyMoments.significance: Shows her versatility in transforming body parts into weapons.

abilities.description: Creates a solid snow wall to block doorways and paths.
Transforms into snow and surrounds opponents' bodies, weakening and immobilizing them with severe cold.
Freezes wing feathers into sharpened solid snow-blades capable of clashing with swords.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Haki-Infused Swordplay
keyMoments.description: Tashigi joins Zoro in fighting Monet, using Busoshoku Haki on her sword to harm the Logia-user.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Tashigi's post-timeskip growth and her mastery of Haki, a critical ability for fighting Logia users.

abilities.description: Infuses her sword with Armament Haki to harm Logia-type Devil Fruit users.

reveals.information: Can use Busoshoku Haki to infuse her sword

keyMoments.title: Uses Heat Egg
keyMoments.description: Nami employs her Heat Egg technique with the Clima-Tact against Monet's snow abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's tactical approach to counter snow-based attacks with heat.

abilities.description: Weather-based heat attack using the Clima-Tact.

keyMoments.title: Uses Cuatro Mano: Spank
keyMoments.description: Robin manifests multiple limbs using her Hana Hana no Mi to execute Cuatro Mano: Spank against Monet.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's combat application of her Devil Fruit powers.

abilities.description: Manifests four arms to strike opponents.
